resources.string: The Starting Strength Program is designed for novice lifters. This program takes advantage of "newbie gains" by adding 10 pounds to the squat after 2 times it\'s performed, 15-20 lbs to the deadlift the first couple times, and 10 lbs the next several times it\'s performed. For the bench press/shoulder press and the power clean you increment by 5lbs. This program is designed for 3 days a week M/W/F.
